name: TkXel
tag_list: iphone-development, android-development, mobile-development, software-development, iphone-game-development, mobile-apps-development, mobile-apps-marketing
overview:
TkXel is a high-end technology services company that specializes in mobile application development and Web 2.0 domains.

Currently, we specialize in iPhone and Android development along with other mobile platforms such as BlackBerry, Windows Mobile and webOS. We offer full-cycle development for games and apps on these platforms which includes the following services: 

* Complete Game and App Conceptualization
* Complete 3D and 2D Game Artwork Pipeline
* Application Interface Design
* User Experience Management
* End to End Programming
* Sound Engineering
* Testing and Quality Assurance
* Marketing

In addition to Game development serices, we also offer:

Web and RIA development Our expertise and services include development in:

* RIA platforms such as Adobe Flex (AIR) , OpenLaszlo, Microsoft Silverlight
* All major RIA and Ajax Toolkits
* All major Web platforms Cake PHP, ROR, Python Django
* CMS based systems including Wordpress and Joomla
* Social Media (Facebook etc) Applications and Games

Enterprise & Business Software Development The Enterprise and Business wing provides customized software development services to its customers and enables them fulfill their business needs. We provide development services in all major enterprise platforms and allied frameworks. Our team is experienced in:

* J2EE and .NET
* Spring, Struts, JPA, Hibernate and nHibernate.
* Most of other popular MVC and ORM based framework

Consulting We provide consulting in the areas of:

* Requirements Gathering and Analysis
* Software Architecture and Design
* Technical training of your development team
* Setting up Software Development, Project Management and Customer Relationship
* Management process
* Business Process Management

Social Media Marketing TkXel has recently entered the social media domain to provide value-added services to our clients. We assist in post-development efforts such as marketing client apps, games and websites to selected audiences on the Internet while providing data reporting and analysis of their marketing campaigns.
